mccrae.tools.struct
Class CollectionChangeEvent<E>

java.lang.Object
  mccrae.tools.struct.CollectionChangeEvent<E>

public class CollectionChangeEvent<E>
extends java.lang.Object

The event for when a collection changes. This event stores the previous value, the new value and an (optional) reference. In general when a new value is added to a collection the event has a null old value and when an object is removed the the event has a null new value.

See Also:
CollectionChangeListener

Constructor Detail

CollectionChangeEvent

public CollectionChangeEvent(E oldVal,
                             E newVal,
                             java.lang.Object reference)
Create an instance of a collection change event

Parameters:
oldVal - The previous value (or null if the event is an add event)
newVal - The new value (or null if the event is a delete event)
reference - An optional reference to indicate the object being edited. For example for List an Integer indexing the value
